title: Normal fps and ping = lags
body:
Fps locked at 120, ping 45 and still got so much lags 
Someone know what is problem ? Thx

replies.body: I've noticed a decent number of EU players having some packet loss issues lately, which means that some of the data going between your network and our servers is getting messed up somehow along the way. Let's check for that first to make sure of what we're dealing with. Check out this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and let me know what it says using a screenshot!

That little bit of packet loss might be the cause of all your troubles. Reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they can find anything in those network logs that they could help with.
